attributes.action: ABOLISH WATER RATES FOR ALL DOMESTIC USERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS WATER IS ESSENTIAL TO LIFE AND HEALTH, WE CALL FOR THE ABOLITION OF WATER RATES: AND THE FUNDING OF SERVICE CURRENTLY PAID FOR BY THEM TO BE FUNDED FROM GENERAL TAXATION.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
